title: Valentine intro overlay audio + hero text update + clean full-screen overlay visuals

acceptanceCriteria: When the intro overlay first appears, no audio plays automatically before any user interaction.
After a user interaction (e.g., tap/click on the overlay), ambient romantic audio can play while the intro overlay remains visible.
Clicking ‚ÄúYes! üíñ‚Äù plays a short romantic confirmation sound effect exactly once and then proceeds to the main page as before.
A clear mute/unmute control is present on the intro overlay; when muted, no sounds play.
Audio/sound effects do not block navigation and do not interfere with reduced-motion behavior.
